description: Run on a Linux node to create a new EC2 instance using supplied parameters. This task expects most resources to support the new instance to already be in place, e.g. subnet, public key pair, security group, etc. The task will create a new instance, attach an EBS volume, and tag the instance with the supplied tags.

ami.description: The AMI to use for the instance

instance_type.description: The type of instance to start

availability_zone.description: The Availability Zone to start the instance in

key_name.description: The key pair to use for the instance

vpc_security_group_ids.description: A list of security group IDs to associate with the instance

subnet_id.description: The VPC Subnet ID to launch the instance in

disable_api_termination.description: Whether the instance can be terminated using the EC2 API

root_volume_type.description: The type of volume to attach as the root volume

root_volume_size.description: The size of the root volume

root_delete_on_termination.description: Whether to delete the root volume on instance termination

ebs_device_name.description: The device name for the EBS volume

ebs_volume_type.description: The type of the EBS volume

ebs_volume_size.description: The size of the EBS volume

ebs_delete_on_termination.description: Whether to delete the EBS volume on instance termination

ebs_iops.description: The provisioned IOPS for the EBS volume
